mapper.insert: INSERT INTO km_checkin_item ( title, description, frequency, username, status, rec_creator, rec_create_time, rec_revisor, rec_revise_time, arch_flag ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{frequency}, #{username}, #{status}, #{recCreator}, NOW(), #{recRevisor}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM km_checkin_item WHERE id = #{id} AND arch_flag = 0
SELECT * FROM km_checkin_item WHERE username = #{userId} AND arch_flag = 0 ORDER BY rec_create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM km_checkin_item WHERE username = #{userId} AND status = #{status} AND arch_flag = 0 ORDER BY rec_create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE km_checkin_item SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, frequency = #{frequency}, status = #{status}, rec_revisor = #{recRevisor}, rec_revise_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE km_checkin_item SET arch_flag = 1, rec_revisor = #{revisor}, rec_revise_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
